Sommerferien

Jun 20, 2016

One of the great joys of having a lifestyle business is … the lifestyle.

As such I recently booked tickets for five weeks of summer break. The kids and I - my wife unfortunately has to work the first few weeks - will be in Heiligenstadt, Thüringen all of August. No plans, just go for hikes in the woods and swimming. We’ll grill some bratwurst. If you’re around and want to swing by and say hello - we’re a ten minute walk from the train station - let me know. Also, the various Mittelpunkte Deutschlands are all nearby, so there’s plenty to do.

May try to day trip it out to the old haunts in Weimar …
